# Introduction {#intro}

The following document is a code companion to [citation](), [doi]().

```{r setup, include = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
packages =  c('utils', 'tidyverse', 'downloadthis',     # packages for data management
              'foreign', 'MplusAutomation',             # packages for writing data         
              'ggplot2', 'sjPlot', 'broom',             # packages for visualization
              'nlme', 'lme4', 'lmerTest',               # packages for MLMs
              'mgcv', 'gamm4',                          # packages for GAMMs
              'lavaan', 'semPlot')                      # packages for SEMs

if (length(setdiff(packages, rownames(installed.packages()))) > 0) {
  install.packages(setdiff(packages, 
                           rownames(installed.packages())), 
                   repos = 'http://cran.us.r-project.org')
}
invisible(lapply(packages, 
                 library, 
                 character.only = TRUE))
```
```{r include=FALSE}
# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'
), 'packages.bib')
```
